work.name: Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence (BCAI), Robert Bosch GmbH
work.summary: Making DL Perception Safe by Model Auditing and Robust Training and Architectures.
highlights: Robustness of Deep Learning (Systematic Errors, Domain Shift, Adversarial Examples)

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
